thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Proshare Advisors Comments On Proshares Short Vix Short-Term Futures ETF

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Proshare Advisors Comments On Proshares Short Vix Short-Term Futures ETF
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Proshare Advisors:
* PROSHARE ADVISORS ISSUES STATEMENT ON PROSHARES SHORT VIX SHORT-TERM FUTURES ETF
* SAYS PERFORMANCE ON MONDAY OF PROSHARES SHORT VIX SHORT-TERM FUTURES ETF WAS “CONSISTENT WITH ITS OBJECTIVE”
* EXPECT PROSHARES SHORT VIX SHORT-TERM FUTURES ETF TO BE OPEN FOR TRADING MONDAY & INTEND TO CONTINUE TO MANAGE FUND AS USUAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
